text: My father is a surgeon and he loves his job. When I was young, I was admired my dad. He gives me a passion for medicine. Consequently, I tried two times the exam to pass in medicine school. But I don't have the result that I want. To move on, I went in X-ray tech school during three years. After, I had got my diploma. For this training, there are a lot of traineeship that its duration is one month in different hospital. When I was in traineeship in Saint-Grégoire, it's a hospitals in Paris, I met a medical engineer, he was very passionated by his job like my father. I talked with him during long time about his job and he gives me his passion. After this meeting, I researched medical engineer school to find this job. I found ESIR in Paris, I did a candidature with my resume and incentive letter. But, they don't want me because they didn't know X-ray tech. Therefore, I went in ESIR's "Portes Ouvertes" and I presented my incentive and my determination to enter in this school. They accepted me few weeks ago. When I had this news, I was so happy and I'm happy too now! My goal is to do a traineeship with this engineer who gives me this passion.
